duties_responsibilities.duty: Leveraging existing strategic client relationships and external presence to expand sales.
Developing strategic account plans and strategies to win new business in existing accounts.
Identifying, bidding on, negotiating, and closing new sales opportunities.
Recruiting high performing talent to the team and building internal relationships.
Providing accurate and detailed weekly forecast funnel of identified and proposed opportunities.
Maintaining an appropriate 90-day funnel and managing to sequential improvements in close rates across the team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent education and experience.
